subject: [Mhln] MS please help, OEM out of MCE
body:
Sometimes the best, and only effective, way to kill an idea is to put it into practice.

If you can't get a job as a pianist in a brothel you become a royal reporter.

Grammar, which can govern even Kings.

Intuition is what tells a wife her husband has done wrong before he thinks of doing it.

America is promises to take! America is promises to us to take them.

Decision making is the specific executive task.

Our lives are a sum total of the choices we have made.

Gratitude is not only the memory but the homage of the heart rendered to God for his goodness.

Ye shall be as gods, knowing good and evil. [Genesis 3:5]

'Tis money that begets money.

Freedom exists only with power.

If you done it, it ain't bragging.

Dying is the most embarrassing thing that can ever happen to you, because someone's got to take care of all your details.
